attributes.title: Read this please
attributes.review: Soooooo this app is LITERALLY one of the worst apps in the App Store. It took FOREVER TO DOWNLOAD😠 IT TOOK TOO MUCH STORAGE😠 IT HACKED MY PHONE😡IT ASKED FOR MY SOCIAL SECURITY AND FOR WHAT ??!?!?? 🤬Literally hacked my computer too.😒How???? Idk. It even hacked my tv it was playing one Lana Rhoades porn videos. 😏I did enjoy watching it tho.😳 Anyways Please do not download this app. 🙏🏼 It’s an app that has too much hate and hacks your things too. 🙄🤚🏼

attributes.title: Great App For Supporters
attributes.review: This app provides up to date information on the POTUS. If you are a supporter of him you will enjoy using this app. If you are not a supporter this isn’t a place for you. TRUMP 2020!

attributes.title: Wow really can’t believe this.
attributes.review: Seriously I expected more from our beloved president, like how can he let his followers get treated like this. After all I have done for him and this country this is the thanks I get. This app is horrible it’s a major hoax, fake news just like climate change and the corona virus don’t download. Make America great again.

attributes.title: Do Not Download! Waste of time
attributes.review: I downloaded this to keep up with Our president. Well it took over 18 hours to download! Which is just ridiculous!  Once I opened it my phone froze I had to restart it! I gave it another chance opened it and it froze again! This app was poorly built! Don’t waste your time!

attributes.title: BAD BAD APP VERY UNSAFE
attributes.review: This is a very unsafe app. It asked me for my phone number and I kept receiving weird messages. The app glitches constantly and shuts down and made my phone crash. I’m afraid this app may have stolen my personal information and I tried to delete the app and it wouldn’t let me. Trump states he hates the coronavirus but yet his app gave my phone a virus. Yuck.

attributes.title: THIS APP WILL HACK YOUR PHONE
attributes.review: i got this app with no problems with my phone, and by the way it took about 25 Minutes to download. the app also kept crashing and powering off my phone! i thought that it was just my phone being broken so i started to delete all of my apps but the one app that couldn’t be deleted was this one! PLEASE DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!!

attributes.title: #FREEBARRON2020
attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!! no❤️ it took a whole day to download and when i click on the app the it made my phone glitch and over heat so i couldn’t use my phone for another whole day then the next day i tried to use the app one more time and this time when i click on the app it took me to pornhub so i just deleted it so DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT!😋🥰🧚🏾‍♂️🦋✨

attributes.title: I cannot believe this app!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and 2 minutes later my entire phone shut down! I had to wait 10 Minutes for my phone to start up again. All of my contacts are now gone. Do not download this app. It is riddled with viruses that will destroy the inner workings of your phone!

attributes.title: Took 4 years to download
attributes.review: I downloaded this app 4 years ago and it is just now finished the full download. Not to mention RUINED my phone. It was so bad that I had to get a new phone! Since I support trump he should have paid for my new phone with his small loan of a million dollars but did he? NO! Don’t get this and ruin your phone.

attributes.title: THIS APP LEAVES VIRUSES
attributes.review: I got this app to track our wonderful President Trump and as soon as I opened the app I got an ad from an evil Chinese company. I’m embarrassed to explain why I clicked because there was a very nice lady showing her tatas;) I was very excited but soon very disappointed to learn that the ad left multiple viruses on my phone. I want President Trump to refund my phone as well.
